metadata.title: CVE-2024-24583 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple out-of-bounds read vulnerabilities exist in the readMSHfunctionality of libigl v2.5.0. A specially crafted .msh file can lead toan out-of-bounds read. An attacker can provide a malicious file to triggerthis vulnerability.This vulnerabilitty concerns the`readMSH` function whileprocessing `MshLoader::ELEMENT_TRI` elements.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
